name: 陳雅玫　教師諮商時間(Office Hours)
objective: In order to cultivate the students’ comprehensive capabilities to use English, especially the listening comprehension and oral expression ability, different multimedia materials, including movies, songs, TV series, online interactional games, online aiding software, etc., are used to help students understand when and how to use language appropriately in various situations. Different activities (listening practice, role-play, group discussion, and oral presentation) are designed to facilitate students’ English learning.
schedule:
Week 1 introduction
Weeks 2 - 5 Learning English through news media
Weeks 6 - 8 Learning English through movie trailers
Week 9 mid-term exam/ English Proficiency Test
Weeks 10 - 13 Learning English through TV series
Weeks 14 - 16 Learning English through online interactional games
Week 17 group presentations
Week 18 final exam

* 本課程規劃為一學年上 / 下學期連續之課程
scorePolicy:
1. continuous assessment (including attendance, participation, homework and quizzes): 35%

2. mid-term and final exams: 35%

3. English Proficiency Test: 20%

4. group presentations: 10%
materials: a collection of learning materials from online video channels (e.g. VoiceTube), news websites (e.g. VOA special English) and TV series (e.g. Friends).
